member.name: ID3D12Object.GetPrivateData
member.summary: Gets application-defined data from a device object.
member.param: The GUID that is associated with the data.
A pointer to a variable that on input contains the size, in bytes, of the buffer that pData points to, and on output contains the size, in bytes, of the amount of data that GetPrivateData retrieved.
A pointer to a memory block that receives the data from the device object if pDataSize points to a value that specifies a buffer large enough to hold the data.
member.returns: This method returns one of the Direct3D 12 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D12Object.SetName
member.summary: Associates a name with the device object. This name is for use in debug diagnostics and tools.
member.param: A NULL-terminated UNICODE string that contains the name to associate with the device object.
member.returns: This method returns one of the Direct3D 12 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D12Object.SetPrivateData
member.summary: Sets application-defined data to a device object and associates that data with an application-defined GUID.
member.param: The GUID to associate with the data.
The size in bytes of the data.

A pointer to a memory block that contains the data to be stored with this device object. If pData is NULL, DataSize must also be 0, and any data that was previously associated with the GUID specified in guid will be destroyed.
member.returns: This method returns one of the Direct3D 12 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D12Object.SetPrivateDataInterface
member.summary: Associates an -derived interface with the device object and associates that interface with an application-defined GUID.
member.param: The GUID to associate with the interface.
A pointer to the -derived interface to be associated with the device object.
member.returns: This method returns one of the Direct3D 12 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D12Object
member.summary: An interface from which and inherit from. It provides methods to associate private data and annotate object names.
